description: EU leaders will meet via video, with Hungary and Poland objecting to funds being tied to rule of law.
title: EU faces challenge from three states to Covid budget
title_page: EU faces challenge from three states to Covid budget - BBC News
maintext: There is a distinct lack of trust in Warsaw about Brussels' real intentions. Poland is currently the largest recipient of EU funds, but it's prepared to block the bloc's new budget, because it calculates it can wait for perhaps a year for a solution to be found, something it reckons many southern EU member states will not be able to do.
